• The GPU resources is a kind of exclusive resources, you may get a `dead kernel` if you're trying to use it while it is used by someone.
• You should be aware that your server may be stopped if it's detected idle.
• You can request a package installation at here
• All tutorial files are put into the directory Tutorials in read only mode.
• Default terminal is switched to bash but the displayed information is incomplete, you may want to fix it with command bash
